website_summaries.verdict: This wet bag has a durable construction and excels at sealing in wetness and odors.
pros: Top notch construction should see you through the diapering years
Water-resistant lining with sealed seams traps moisture and odors
Snap handle for hanging or strapping it to a stroller
Comes in a variety of cute prints and colors
cons: Somewhat small, doesn't hold as much as comparable bags

customer_reviews.title: Perfect until it’s disgusting no matter what you do.
customer_reviews.text: If you asked me 3 weeks ago today review this bag it would have been 4.5 stars. It wasn’t perfect but it did what I wanted with little fuss. Today as I was wiping it out the inside lining started to peel and there was mold or mildew under the inner bag. Gross! I use this bag 5 days a week with a sealed ice pack and milk in a ziplock inside the bag. At the end of the day I turn it inside out to dry. Once a week I gently wash it with dawn and rinse. I consider this bag very gently used over less than 5 months. Really disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyDogLady

customer_reviews.title: Great quality wet bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything Itzy Ritzy! Already had the half size snack bags. Use them to put pacifiers in so they dont get dirty in the diaper bag. I've been wanting a wet bag since last summer so I decided to go ahead and get one for this summer. I LOVE the print. Very colorful and summery! The quality is great, as always. I just ordered another itzy ritzy snack bag but in the full size. These bags are definitely a mom must have! You can literally use them for EVERYTHING! Not just for babies and toddlers but big kids and adults too. There just awesome all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Amber H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for dirty diapers while remaining stylish
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this!! Perfect fabric design, high quality and stylish! I have already gotten lots of compliments on it. I use it to keep dirty diapers in while I'm out and about. Don't want to put those in other people's trash bins stinking up their homes. I highly recommended!! (I have it pictured next to the snack bag)
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Wet Bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our cloth diapers. We went a whole day with a heavy wetter and not a single drop escaped from the bag. The liner is of a “rubbery” consistency. Then when you’re done, you just throw it in the wash. It’s perfect. We purchased the pink with black bow bag to match my diaper bag. The pink is more of a mauve color and darker than the picture. Still super cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Stone

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: So I mostly like this wet bag. It has worked well, it's cute, and it holds moisture very well. The only thing I don't like is the double layers are kind of annoying for me. The outer cloth may have shrunk a bit, and after stuffing the inner layer back in, it doesn't sit flush together. And getting the inner layer back in is not super easy. I'll keep it, and I do like it, but it's not my favorite. I greatly prefer the Bumkins wet bags.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for wet things but...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice bag for wet or messy items. It is a great pattern and very vibrant. However, on the first wash, it fell apart around the zipper seam. For the price, that’s pretty disappointing. It still works, just not nearly as well since you have to be careful around that part of the zipper. I may have gotten a defective one, but I’m not sure I’d buy another just in case it happened again since you can’t do a replacement or return after you have washed items.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - certainly not a sealed wet bag
customer_reviews.text: The product seamed ok at first. Have used it to store wet toiletries after a swim session. Seemed ok the first two trips but on the third, liquid started to leak out. I can understand if liquid leaked out of the zipper but to call it a sealed wet bag but have liquid seep out the bottom completely defeats the purpose. There are better and larger waterproof bags out there fir the same or slightly higher price. Disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Venkat R.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful wet bag! My favorite brand
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE our Dino Itsy Ritzy wetbag. We use cloth diapers and this is the only brand we have tried that conceals smell. We have several of these and they hold up so well. They hold a lot including 2 cloth diapers and an outfit. We have never had a leak before either, they are waterproof on inside. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Salens

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it yet, but it does seem really nice quality and good construction. There was a slight color discrepancy as it’s not just black and white as it looks like in the picture, actually has dominant turquoise lines in the cactus, still cute. Bigger than I expected too which I don’t mind at all. I’ll probably order another one and the smaller version because these are going to be handy AF. I never bought wet bags with my two older kiddos, thinking I should have now. Will update review after using.
customer_reviews.author: RW13

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: These are the best wet bags. Fantastic quality, worth every penny. I feel this bag will last for years and when baby is older can use for swimsuit bag. I loved it so much I bought the bigger size too.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: its ok
customer_reviews.text: it holds more than i thought but what annoys me is the way they constructed this? it turns itself inside out in the wash and the lining separated from the printed fabric on the outside and you have to stuff it back in. I can never get it in there correctly and it ends up lumpy. It serves its purpose but I rarely use it for this reason
customer_reviews.author: MEdmonds

customer_reviews.title: Love Itzy Ritzy
customer_reviews.text: This bag is huge and can hold all sorts of things. It keeps the wetness inside the bag so it is easy to take diapers, wet towels, etc apart from everything else.
customer_reviews.author: AmznJunkieX

customer_reviews.title: Not a wipeable/waterproof material on the outside
customer_reviews.text: It’s my own fault for not reading into it more before purchasing (i just loved the cactus print!) But the outside of this bag (all the cactus print) is a cotton material. All the other wet/dry bags I have are a neoprene or wipeable slick material. The cotton gets wet at the pool (I use these for wet swimsuits). And if anything gets spilled on it, it’s just going to get soaked up instead of repelling the water. I wish I would have known the material before I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: DaddyShark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality! Perfect for toddler potty training.
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST. Great quality of materials. Use for soiled clothes during potty training and never had leaks. Easy to wash and hang dry. Did not absorb smells. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: CSmith

customer_reviews.title: Great problem solver!
customer_reviews.text: What to do with wet diapers when traveling and no way to dispose? Be sure you have one of these great Wet Bags. This year has brought a bumper crop of babies to our friends and relatives, including our son and daughter-in-law. They have chosen to use cloth diapers for their newborn, and I just knew that there would come a time when that very question would come up. Sure enough! But they were prepared, because they had this ample sized bag come to the rescue. It is well constructed, and washable to keep it smelling fresh. I plan to include this item as a gift to future new parents as I learn of their expectancy.
customer_reviews.author: mashenn

customer_reviews.title: Love it that I got one as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Had these when my son was small and loved them for his soiled cloth diapers. I decided to get one as a useful gift wrap for a baby sweater. Bonus!
customer_reviews.author: SsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: perfect for swimmers
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought this bag I was using rash bags to bring my wet swimsuit and towel home from the pool. I was looking for a more eco friendly and less gross solution and this bag has 100% delivered. the large is exactly the right size for a swimsuit and a towel with a decent amount of room left over. as a bonus, the snap loop is a great place to put your shower shoes. highly recommend for swimmers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute, great size, high quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the colorful rainbow design! The product seems super high quality from the zipper, to the fabric to the stitching. I also really like the soft cloth feel on the outside versus a canvas feel that other snack bags out there have. And I love that it can fold up really compactly when needed. I gave this 4 stars instead of 5 stars because I haven't had it long enough to speak to it's longevity quite yet.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn L.

customer_reviews.title: Slow to dry; eyesore threads
customer_reviews.text: It has a waterproof layer and a fabric layer. Takes a long time to dry. The loose threads of the fabric are visible through the fabric, but possible to get off. Much prefer our Bumpkins bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great for carrying lunch and snacks
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag to hold my lunch and some snacks. It is great for this use. I don’t worry about anything leaking out: I usually have washed grapes and sometimes other potentially leaky foods. I carry it with other miscellaneous work things in a tote bag.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.  Little expensive
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product. Gorgeous floral material. The inside is very nice. This does not feel cheap. This is my last baby so I wanted to get more girly stuff since I’m having a girl.
customer_reviews.author: Xiomara

customer_reviews.title: A baby necessity!
customer_reviews.text: I love having this for any accidents that could happen with baby. The design is so adorable & the inside is very protected.
customer_reviews.author: Tori Brummette

customer_reviews.title: Baby must have
customer_reviews.text: I bought another one for daycare and also for a few friends that are having babies! It is my favorite baby necessity. I always bring it and baby often needs changed in car so it’s great for not smelling poopy diapers for the rest of the car ride.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie Gifford

customer_reviews.title: great quality!
customer_reviews.text: love the material, great quality! inside is definitely waterproof. the outside material is a cloth material but still washable. love adjustable strap. will be using these for my sons cloth diapers. smaller one will be left in diaper bag and the larger one at home!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Cute & helpful
customer_reviews.text: Love the print because we are animal lovers! Bought for my daughters boss bag for dirty clothes and for other items when she gets bigger. :)
customer_reviews.author: La'Kesha Abell

customer_reviews.title: Water resistant
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. My daughter has a few for toddler and wants more for baby due in March
customer_reviews.author: LindadB

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: So adorable and nice and durable feeling. We use them as wet bags for my kids at daycare for their dirty clothes to come home in.
customer_reviews.author: S_Strow

customer_reviews.title: Handy Needed Accessories
customer_reviews.text: First of the print on this wet bag is the cutest! They have so many prints makes it hard to buy just one! The medium is actually really big like a good size I can hold so much I can only imagine how much the large can hold. The material is soft but sturdy. Very well made and very much worth it. Also extremely happy with my Mini diaper bag, packing cubes and pacifiers (not pictured)
customer_reviews.author: Crystal p.

customer_reviews.title: Good size & handy tote to keep stuff cool.
customer_reviews.text: I have a pool & like to keep my phone & sunscreen in it as easy tote. Nice size!
customer_reviews.author: Gunzrus

customer_reviews.title: Great for many uses
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great for so many uses. I plan to mostly use it to carry my baby's change of clean clothes then put the dirty, soiled clothes back in the bag. The medium is the perfect size for me and fits nicely in my diaper bag. It's awesome that it is waterproof and that I can launder it! Love this find.
customer_reviews.author: drumbuggie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag!!! I swim every day and this carries the wet suit perfectly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Schwarber

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag its great and stylish. Would buy this again and again
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I love all the itzy ritzy bags! They are durable and easy to wash- I either throw them in the washer or hand wash the inside. Super helpful with a little one in the family.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie w.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. I keep this in my child's diaper bag for emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Transport
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this to use for baby clothes when out running errands In case of a blowout but now I use it to bring home my Spectra pump parts at the end of the from work. I wash the inside of the bag every night and it’s held up great.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: The pattern is REALLY cute, but the inside is ...
customer_reviews.text: The pattern is REALLY cute, but the inside is plastic-y and not attached well to the front, so it's hard to wash and dry well. And as it has dried multiple times, the outside and inside layers don't line up anymore.
customer_reviews.author: CurlyQ

customer_reviews.title: Holds smell and water better than other wet bags I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag for my babies cloth diapers and it is well made. No odor or wetness seeps through
customer_reviews.author: The Mrs.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: I can’t explain everything but this is amazing. I love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great for soiled cloth diapers or for wet bathing suits and clothes. Would buy again. And the company offers adorable patterns.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn W.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Itzy ritzy is my favorite baby brand. They make amazing products and never ever been disappointed. Their CS is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Carson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the wet bags! They are large enough to put 2 swimsuits or any clothes! The cactus print is so cute too!! Great for traveling, or by the pool!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Quality bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great price & cute design! Was looking for a medium-sized, washable bag to keep baby’s teething toys in for travel. Great quality! I like that it’s not stiff material (as compared to JJB pouches) & the snap handle is convenient. Probably going to buy this in other patterns!
customer_reviews.author: AE Ben

customer_reviews.title: Good sized bag!! Very versatile!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the medium sized with the black and white stripes with flowers on it. The print is so cute and it matched with out itzy ritzy high chair and shopping cart cover!! I use this bag to store our cover in it so that it can be kept neatly in out truck or diaper bag when needed. It’s such a good sized bag and the material it very good also. Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: A must have for Momma's on the go
customer_reviews.text: Only been used for a few days and man do we love it. We use it for the daycare to send home and soiled clothing/bibs. So far no leaks and no odor!
customer_reviews.author: Candice N.

customer_reviews.title: Wet bag
customer_reviews.text: I have 12 of these bags in this color! They are amazing and I love the pattern. Great for boy or girl. I have many of these also in different designs in medium and large size. Never know when you’ll need one.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Currently using this as a wet bag for dirty cloth diapers. Haven’t tested its ability to hold wet clothing (which I intend to use it for wet swimwear in the future). Cleans well and has nice thick material keeps odor out as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Bags! Super cute prints and they are such good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. Currently I’m using it to store pump parts and bottles for when I’m traveling. Otherwise it holds my toddler swimwear for class. Love that your can just throw this in the wash after each use.
customer_reviews.author: xuankristy

customer_reviews.title: Great for damp clothes
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put dirty workout clothes in and works great for that. Also recently took on a trip to Belize and was perfect for damp bathing suits and clothes.
customer_reviews.author: ebo83

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Thick material, great inner lining, easy to use and cute design.
customer_reviews.author: GTino

customer_reviews.title: Sadly this adorable wet bag did not last us an entire year ...
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this adorable wet bag did not last us an entire year of once weekly use. The lining deteriorated after a couple months until we were unable to use at all :(
customer_reviews.author: V. Schuler

customer_reviews.title: I use this daily for pump parts. I put ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily for pump parts. I put them in this bag while at work and keep the bag in the fridge. I wash everything out when I get home. Works really well. I plan to use it for swimsuits when I'm done pumping.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great for child’s swim practice
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size for my child’s swim practice items. It easily fits a swim suit, full sized towel, goggles, swim cap, and comb with a little room to spare. Construction seems good quality.
customer_reviews.author: M. M. C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Wet Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have Wet Bag in case of an accident or after swimming ! Great quality and cute woodlands print
customer_reviews.author: Katie P.

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: This has been great to take along in the diaper bag to put my baby's dirty clothing in after she has a blowout! It's much cuter and better for the environment than the grocery bags I had been using previously. I am excited to test it at the beach this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Bellew

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy and durable this bag is. It keeps water/moisture from leaking out and is made with really good materials. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very large
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag.. it’s huge! Much bigger then expected so I purchased the smaller size but I love the big size as well.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pattern & great size. Fits 3 wet bathing suits with no issues and no leaks. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Wertheimer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE BAGS
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE BAGS. I used them for wet swimsuits and towels after swim class. They have not leaked yet and I've been using them for a few months now.
customer_reviews.author: Megan R.

customer_reviews.title: Cute bag
customer_reviews.text: Super cute whale design and a decent size. If we don't put wet suits in it, we put the kids wet pool toys and it's fantastic. I'm so glad to have this in our pool bag just in case.
customer_reviews.author: carebear80

customer_reviews.title: I like the material and the print
customer_reviews.text: Uses it daily at daycare for his wet clothes. I like the material and the print.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Worth.every.penny.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, a must have for anyone with a kid in diapers. You can put the grossest stuff in it and then throw it in the washer and it’s good as new. Also works great for older kids activities (swim lesson for example)
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: great travel laundry bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for dirty clothes or diapers on the go in the diaper bag. Seals in wet and Oder then just flip it inside out and chuck in the wash. Has not faded!
customer_reviews.author: KikiBird

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing!! I've used it a couple times for traveling and putting wet beach clothes.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: I love these bags
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags. I use them to store baby food on the go. It fits a few pouches/jars, spoon, bib and cup (depending on the size). Very easy to clean - just throw in the wash or wipe out. Will purchase more of these.
customer_reviews.author: bcsach

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this wet bag! Super cute design and really great size! My little one even loves to carry it around!
customer_reviews.author: Hallie

customer_reviews.title: Great back for wet swim and workout gear
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag for my wet swimsuit after going to the gym which works much better than a plastic target bag. So far this bag has held up well. I haven't washed it yet so I haven't had any issues in that area. I love the print too!
customer_reviews.author: MSP Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great for reusable diapers at daycare! So versatile and great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: A nice big size for wet clothes for my baby girl due soon. Cant wait. Such a cute print!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and cute
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wet bag. It's the perfect size for a diaper bag. I have a couple other wet bags but I like this one the best because its very sturdy and thick so I don't have to worry about it leaking. You can use it for cloth diapers or even a wet swim suit, etc. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Faith C.

customer_reviews.title: Best wet bag out there!!
customer_reviews.text: So stinking cute!! Wonderfully made and I couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Leopard Convenient Bag
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant to get it. But, I'm glad I did I use it for traveling with my pumping parts or just keeping them organized around the house :)
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for baby and mom!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! So great for everything! Recently used when me and my husband went away for the night without the baby!! It was Perfect for all bathroom essentials!
customer_reviews.author: jenna jay

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags for my sweaty gym clothes and for ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags for my sweaty gym clothes and for dirty laundry while traveling! Easy to clean and the snap loop is a great new feature!
customer_reviews.author: allisonholly

customer_reviews.title: Must have diaper bag item!
customer_reviews.text: 4 months in of using this and it is a must have!! So convenient to have this for any clothes that get messy! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and spacious laundry bag
customer_reviews.text: Spacious and well made bag. Sturdy zipper and washes well in washer. Cute flamingo print. It is perfect size to keep in diaper bag for wet or spiked clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thick bag, great material
customer_reviews.text: Just as described! Will use this to hold cloth diapers, about a days worth (5-6) will fit. The material is really thick, so leaks aren’t an issue and the print is modern.
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: Cute design
customer_reviews.text: Super cute design. Easy to clean/wash. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Bonet

customer_reviews.title: Really spacious
customer_reviews.text: Love this beautifull colors and really big ! Perfect to pack alot of baby things
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Paniagua

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Love anything black and white for my toddler-this bag was perfect! The quality is superb- super thick and absorbent. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dana DiBiccari

customer_reviews.title: Cute, small, but absorbant.
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my diaper bag. Perfect size to hold 1-2 cloth diapers, but takes a long time to dry after the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Larson

customer_reviews.title: Great wet bag
customer_reviews.text: Great wet bag! Well constructed, good quality- and just really cute! We use it regularly year round for swimsuits at the pool and it's held up nice!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L

customer_reviews.title: These bags are great! They are large enough to hold a large ...
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great! They are large enough to hold a large amount of items, but clean so easily. Very easy to flip out the inside and wipe it down.
customer_reviews.author: n.b.c.romer

customer_reviews.title: Love the print
customer_reviews.text: Loved this! However the strap did rip off after about a month
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hiles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. its lined with plastic and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for potty training
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great and I don't know why I never ordered one before. This would have been great for spit up clothes. We used it for accidents with my daughter who is potty training. It works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa & Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Sustainable and Reusable bag
customer_reviews.text: We were using ziplock bags to store yogurt and other lunch items that leak for months. Finally, this bag came to our attention and it seemed like a very earth-friendly alternative. It is water proof on the inside and cleans out easy if there is a spill. The outside is adorable and stylish with the animal print.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Well made, cute print!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! It’s exactly what I was looking for to add to my diaper bag!! Well made and adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Raneiro

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wet bag!!
customer_reviews.text: This wet bag is gorge!!! I can’t wait to use it!!
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Great wet bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this little bag it’s great to keep in the diaper bag for emergencies bills or if we go to the beach or pool
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Burton

customer_reviews.title: Great for wet swimwear
customer_reviews.text: I use this to hold wet swimwear after my son's swim class. It's not big enough to hold his towel also, but it easily fits his swim trunks and shirt. Keeps everything else in the bag from getting soaked.
customer_reviews.author: happymama

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great for bathing suits! Keeps the wet inside and dry outside! This replaced me using plastic bags for my kids swim suits everyday! Love this bag. I got it monogrammed at a local store and it looks and functions amazingly!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa O

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: This wet bag is the perfect size for a set of clothes or swimsuit. I love the snap wristlet handle.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: I like
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality, though a bit small. You can't beat the cuteness.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Lubkin

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are very high quality, have gorgeous prints, and launder well. I was surprised how much I loved these bags!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: I use this ALL the time
customer_reviews.text: We go to the pool frequently. I put my swimsuit and my 2 year old's both in this. Plenty big enough for both.
customer_reviews.author: Toddler Mom

customer_reviews.title: Happy To Get my Reusable bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality bag with a handy zipper that holds all my baby's bibs, clothes and dirty laundry to go out. It is a great size and folds neatly in the diaper bag. I wish I got it sooner. I will definitely get the snack size bags that match the same design. Very nice packaging, colors, and good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Kim overman

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag and pattern
customer_reviews.text: Keeps everything sealed inside and looks great- love the whales!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I keep one of these in my diaper bag for accidents! Love it
customer_reviews.author: katrinajoy

customer_reviews.text: Purchased this wet bag in Big Top Dot, absolutely love it! Ordering another! Big enough to put wet clothes/bibs/burp rags in, and getting the second one to store diaper bag essentials in.

product_meta.title: Itzy Ritzy Sealed Wet Bag With Adjustable Handle – Washable and Reusable Wet Bag with Water Resistant Lining Ideal for Swimwear, Diapers, Gym Clothes & Toiletries; Measures 11” x 14”, XOXO
product_meta.description: Color:Black/White| Size:MediumThe Itzy Ritzy Travel Happens Sealed Wet Bag is the best way to store and travel with wet or dry items. It provides multiple uses for any age group of your family and can hold diapers, cosmetics, wet clothes/swimwear, wipes, beach gear, bibs, toiletries, bottles, baby food and more. At Itzy Ritzy, we believe that parenting in style is possible. Our collection is designed to provide families with smart and stylish solutions to everyday parenting challenges. From multi-purpose designs that empower and chic prints that inspire, to solutions that raise consciousness, we've reinvented practical luxury for modern families around the world while remaining true to our core vision of keeping things simple. Itzy Ritzy products are made with the highest quality workmanship, machine washable fabrics and are CPSIA certified safe for baby. Visit Itzy-Ritzy for more information on Itzy Ritzy and our extensive line of products.
feature_bullets: Itzy Ritzy Reusable Wet Bags are perfect for separating wet items while keeping the rest of the items in your diaper bag dry

Our wet bags are also perfect for keeping in your beach bag for wet swimsuits or towels, in your gym bag for used workout gear, in your suitcase for toiletries while traveling, or for keeping odors from dirty diapers contained
The adjustable handle of the wet bag snaps open and closed, making it easy to attach to other bags, strollers, or the back of the seat in your car
Our wet bags are water resistant with sealed seams and include a zipper closure and thick polyurethane interior
Our medium wet bag measures 11” x 14”; Machine washable in cold water with like colors, line drying is recommended
